title: Rook in Quarantine || Caruana vs Ding || MC Invitational (2020)
description:
Support fishnet here https://lichess.org/get-fishnet

Follow me on Instagram for extra content and notifications https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Fabiano Caruana vs Ding Liren
Magnus Carlsen Invitational GAME 4, 21.4.2020
Ruy Lopez, Berlin defence (C65)

1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bb5 Nf6 4. d3 Bc5 5. Bxc6 dxc6 6. Nbd2 O-O 7. O-O Re8 8. Kh1 a5 9. Nc4 Nd7 10. a4 b6 11. b3 f6 12. Be3 Bb4 13. Nh4 Nf8 14. Nf5 Ne6 15. Qg4 g6 16. Qg3 Bc3 17. Rad1 Kh8 18. Nh6 Qe7 19. Qh4 Rf8 20. h3 Qg7 21. Ng4 g5 22. Qg3 Nf4 23. Bd2 Ne2 24. Qh2 Bd4 25. Nge3 Be6 26. Rde1 Nf4 27. Qg3 Qg6 28. Qf3 h5 29. Nf5 g4 30. Qg3 Bxf5 31. exf5 Qxf5 32. Re4 gxh3 33. Bxf4 exf4 34. Qxh3 Qxh3+ 35. gxh3 c5 36. Rxf4 Kh7 37. Kg2 Rae8 38. Kf3 f5 39. Ne3 Bg7 40. Rg1 Bh6 41. Rh4 f4 42. Nd5 Re5 43. Nxc7 Rf6 44. c3 Rg6 45. Rd1 Rc6 46. Nb5 Kg6 47. d4 cxd4 48. cxd4 Rxb5 49. axb5 Rc3+ 50. Ke4 Bg5 51. Rg1 Kh6 52. Rxf4 Bxf4 53. Kxf4 Rxb3 54. d5 a4 55. Rd1 Rb4+ 56. Kf5 Rxb5 57. Ke6 Rb2 58. d6 Re2+ 59. Kd5 Rxf2 60. d7 Rf8 61. Kc6 Kg5 62. d8=Q+ Rxd8 63. Rxd8 Kh4 64. Rd3

World Champion Magnus Carlsen takes on world blitz no. 1 Hikaru Nakamura today in a 4-game rapid match as the $250,000 Magnus Carlsen Invitational begins. Usually that pairing would eclipse any other match, but 16-year-old Alireza Firouzja taking on world no. 3 Ding Liren is almost as mouth-watering. Can Alireza continue in the form that saw him beat Magnus in the Banter Blitz Cup final? All the games will be streamed live on chess24 with commentary in 9 languages as a new age of online chess begins.

https://chess24.com/en/read/news/the-magnus-carlsen-invitational-starts-today
